title: Poster, 1992
inscribed: Imprinted at lower left: logo and "Réunion/ des Musées/ Nationaux/..." (in black) and "Exposition réalisée avec le concours/ FONDATION ELECTRICITE DE FRANCE" (in white).
description:
Exhibition poster for works of Hector Guimard at Musée d'Orsay in Paris.
Photographic reproduction of profile view of iron chair in art nouveau style.  Incised at rear leg: "Style Guimard".  Chair against photographic reproduction of wall covering of large swirls of silver, yellow, and orange on repetition of beige swirl motifs.  Picture shows  water stain damage on wall covering at top center.  Imprinted "Guimard" (in black) at top center. Imprinted at top right: logo "Musée d'Orsay/ 15 avril/ 26 juillet 1992/ Fermé le lundi./ Ouvert le dimanche/ de 9 heures à 21 heures 45, tous les autres jours/ de 10 heures à 18 heures./  A partir du 20 juin,/ ouverture tous les jours dès 9 heures" (all right justified).  
Imprinted "© Ministère de la Culture et de la Communication-Impression: Auclair-Maquette: Didier Chapelot - IA 100675" (in black) at bottom left edge.  Credits at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, 1992. Offset lithography. Gift of Unknown Donor. 1994-114-17.
